original_title: In One's Breath - Nothing Stands Still
overview: In One's Breath - Nothing Stands Still draws inspiration from the Muong epic, The Birth of Soil and Water, forming a comparison betwen the ancient past and the modern world with the pantheist thinking in the text. It documents the excessive development of natural resources in Hanam, resulting in serious pollutions, loss of biodiversity and catastrophic consequences for its culture and inhabitants.
title: In One's Breath - Nothing Stands Still
